text: Andreas Biermann (13 September 1980 - 18 July 2014) was a German footballer. He played as a defender. He played from 1999 until his death in 2014. The last team he played for was FSV Spandauer Kickers. Biermann was born in West Berlin. He was married and had two children. Biermann killed himself on 18 July 2014 in Berlin, aged 33. He had depression for many years. He was known to have tried to kill himself three times. ==References== ==Other websites== * Andreas Biermann at Transfermarkt * Category:1980 births Category:2014 deaths Category:German footballers Category:Sportspeople from Berlin Category:Sportspeople who committed suicide Category:Suicides in Germany
title: Andreas Biermann
